tool.name: gSSURGOExportByState

param.name: SSURGO_Downloads
param.dialogReference:
Folder containing the user's local repository for SSURGO downloads using the 'soil_<AREASYMBOL>' naming convention. SSURGO datasets containing both shapefiles and Template databases must already exist in a single folder on the user's computer. Use one of the 'Download' tools in the SSURGO Download Toolsbox for this task.

Standard SSURGO folder structure MUST exist for the input datasets:

  • folder name - 'soil_<areasymbol>'. Folder names beginning with 'wss' will be ignored.

  • spatial and tabular subfolders

  • soil polygon shapefile name - 'soilmu_a_<areasymbol>'

  • either the tabular-textfiles or populated Access Template databases must exist.

  • If Template databasesare used they must reside in the tabular folder and be named 'soil_d_<areasymbol>.mdb'

  • If an error appears, check the selected polygons in the boundary layer and make sure that SSURGO data has been downloaded and placed in the correct folder.

param.name: Output_Folder
param.dialogReference:
Folder where output geodatabases will reside. This directory should NOT be a geodatabase.

The output geodatabases are automatically named using this convention: 'gSSURGO_' + < state abbreviation >.gdb

param.name: States
param.expression: Alabama | Alaska | Arizona | Arkansas | California | Colorado | Connecticut | Delaware | District of Columbia | Florida | Georgia | Hawaii | Idaho | Illinois | Indiana | Iowa | Kansas | Kentucky | Louisiana | Maine | Maryland | Massachusetts | Michigan | Minnesota | Mississippi | Missouri | Montana | Nebraska | Nevada | New Hampshire | New Jersey | New Mexico | New York | North Carolina | North Dakota | Ohio | Oklahoma | Oregon | Pennsylvania | Puerto Rico and U.S. Virgin Islands | Rhode Island | South Carolina | South Dakota | Tennessee | Texas | Utah | Vermont | Virginia | Washington | West Virginia | Wisconsin | Wyoming | American Samoa | Federated States of Micronesia | Guam | Marshall Islands | Northern Mariana Islands | Palau
param.dialogReference: List of choices for the output geodatabases. Some of the island surveys may be grouped together for convenience, even if they are not members of the same state or territory.

param.name: Overwrite_output
param.dialogReference: Overwrite existing geodatabases. Default setting is True.

param.name: Require_All_Data
param.dialogReference: Controls whether all available SSURGO datasets are required to create a geodatabase. Availability is determined by the statusmap on Web Soil Survey.

param.name: Use_Text_Files
param.dialogReference:
Unchecked: import attribute data from Access database

Checked: import attribute data from text files in tabular folder

tool.summary: Batch-mode tool for creating multiple gSSURGO databases by state tile. Will not work for Pacific Basin as of 1-15-2014.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Batch-mode tool for creating multiple gSSURGO databases by state tile. Will not work for Pacific Basin as of 1-15-2014.
